org.sonatype.goodies.dropwizard.app

Interface ApplicationCustomizer<T extends ApplicationSupport<C>,C extends io.dropwizard.Configuration>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RatelimitCustomizer, RequestRuleCustomizer, SwaggerCustomizer

    public interface ApplicationCustomizer<T extends ApplicationSupport<C>,C extends io.dropwizard.Configuration>
    Allows various customization of application configuration and environment.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    See Also:
    ApplicationSupport.addCustomizer(ApplicationCustomizer[])

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void customize(T application, C config, io.dropwizard.setup.Environment environment)
      Applied after injection is ready.
      default void initialize(io.dropwizard.setup.Bootstrap<C> bootstrap)
      Contribute to bootstrap.
      default List<com.google.inject.Module> modules(C config, io.dropwizard.setup.Environment environment)
      Contribute modules for injection.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        default void initialize(io.dropwizard.setup.Bootstrap<C> bootstrap)
                 throws Exception
        Contribute to bootstrap.
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception from customization will cause the server to abort.

      • modules

        default List<com.google.inject.Module> modules(C config,
                                               io.dropwizard.setup.Environment environment)
                                        throws Exception
        Contribute modules for injection. This is called before the container environment is constructed.
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception from customization will cause the server to abort.

      • customize

        default void customize(T application,
                       C config,
                       io.dropwizard.setup.Environment environment)
                throws Exception
        Applied after injection is ready.
        Throws:
        Exception - Any exception from customization will cause the server to abort.
